::Slayer::

Slayer smiles, flying toward Turkey and hearing Ignatius. He suddenly opens one of his feet, almost dropping his passanger on purpouse. Ignatius woudl have fallen if it hadn't been for Slayer's other leg still gripping the bird's back.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius looks down again, somehow the height made him nervous. It was like
> he wasn't aware that he had wings on his back. "Just try not to drop me." he
> says, desperately hopeing that his words would make the difference between
> flying and falling.
